tool_description: Official Postal Ninja tracking API for developers
name: Postal Ninja
title: Postal Ninja

api_list.name: createTrack
api_list.description: Returns ID of newly created package (status=CREATED) or stored ID if this tracking number already exists (status=FOUND).

utterances.utterance: Can you track the package with the tracking number 1Z999AA10123456784?
I need to find the status of my shipment with tracking code 1234567890.
Please track the parcel with tracking number 9876543210 and carrier ID UPS.
What is the current location of the package with tracking code AB123456789CD?
Track my package with the tracking number 1Z12345E1512345676 and destination country US.
Can you provide the status for the package with tracking code 1122334455?
I need to track a shipment with tracking number 9988776655 and carrier ID FedEx.
Please find the details of the package with tracking code 5566778899.
Track the parcel with tracking number 1231231231 and destination country code CA.
What is the delivery status of the package with tracking code 3213213213?

api_list.name: refreshTrack
api_list.description: Submits on-demand refresh request to tracking engine for package with given ID. Please note, that packages in ACTIVE list are auto-tracked regularly so you don't need to do this for such packages.

utterances.utterance: Can you refresh the tracking information for package ID 12345ABC?
Please update the tracking status for my shipment with ID ZXCV6789.
I need the latest tracking details for package ID 98765XYZ.
Could you refresh the tracking data for the parcel with ID 112233AABB?
Get the most recent tracking update for package ID LMNOP1234.
Please refresh the tracking information for my order with ID 55667788.
I want to check the latest status for package ID ABCD123456.
Can you update the tracking details for shipment ID 99887766?
Refresh the tracking info for my parcel with ID 1234WXYZ.
I need an update on the tracking status for package ID QWERTY9876.

api_list.name: moveTrack
api_list.description: Moves package with given ID to ARCHIVED, TRASHED or back to ACTIVE list.

utterances.utterance: Can you move package with ID 12345 to the archived list?
Please move the package with ID ABCD123 to the trashed list.
I need the package with ID 98765 moved back to the active list.
Move the package with ID ZXCV6789 to the archived list.
Could you please move the package with ID 112233 to the trashed list?
Transfer the package with ID LMNOP456 to the active list.
I want the package with ID 555AAA moved to the archived list.
Please move the package with ID 999XYZ to the trashed list.
Can you move the package with ID 777GHI back to the active list?
Move the package with ID QWERTY123 to the archived list.
